entry.value: !comparison and (courseInfoWrapper.courseInfo.stateKey ne T(org.kuali.student.r2.common.dto.DtoConstants).STATE_NOT_APPROVED) and modifiableCourse and canRetireCourse and ! courseInfoWrapper.uiHelper.curriculumSpecialistUser

property.name: render
property.value: @{!comparison and canRetireCourse and ((courseInfoWrapper.courseInfo.stateKey eq T(org.kuali.student.r2.common.dto.DtoConstants).STATE_ACTIVE) or (courseInfoWrapper.courseInfo.stateKey eq T(org.kuali.student.r2.common.dto.DtoConstants).STATE_APPROVED))}

property.name: promptText
property.value: Do you want to use the curriculum review process?

bean.p:messageText: Note: This is not the current version of this course.
